doc.field: Series III: Prints and manuscript material
Series III: Prints and manuscript material

4 x 5" prints were matched to negative numbers and housed in boxes by number. Mounted prints (often duplicates of the loose prints) were grouped by subject and housed in folders. Copy prints made by N-YHS are housed after the vintage mounted prints. This Series also includes Stonebridge's logbook of photographs, and a number of his grammar school records and certificates of merit.
